name: I Love My Job (Felipe_Hideki, Kalann, Jose Vinicius Takeshi)
name_original: I Love My Job (Felipe_Hideki, Kalann, Jose Vinicius Takeshi)
description:
Congratulations, you have been hired by a big electronics factory and have become another cog in the production of wealth for the magnates. But don't pay attention to the details, this job will guarantee you a good hourly wage. 

And don't worry if this job will take 20 years of your life, we also offer you a life insurance and an incredible 10 days off per year (you can't claim two or more days in a row). We have everything you need so I'm sure you have no reason to refuse to build boards and circuits 12 hours a day... right?
